hero.title: Divorcy will help you plan and estimate the costs of your divorce
hero.subtitle: Having a divorce sucks! Divorcy helps you make smart and swift decisions. So you can start focusing on your future - not your past!

understanding-card.title: Understanding
understanding-card.description: The reason for your divorce? Thatâ€™s not our business. But to give you personalized recommendations, we need to understand your current situation with just a couple of clicks.

calculating-card.title: Calculating
calculating-card.description: Money is unfortunately a big topic. With just a little information, we can estimate the one time and ongoing cost you have to bear or the alimony you receive.

action-card.title: Action
action-card.description: Get your individual results incl. tailored recommendations and clear next steps.

question-1.title: Where are you on your personal journey?
